title: Abbie Chatfield enjoyed a weekend away with Bachelorette runner-up Todd King 'but that's it'
text:
They were sensationally pictured this week rolling around on a beach kissing.

But The Bachelor's Abbie Chatfield insists she and Bachelorette runner-up Todd King are nothing more than just good mates.

On Monday, the 24-year-old property analyst told Mamamia: 'We're good friends and have had a weekend together but that's it! [It's] nothing serious.'

'It's nothing serious!' Abbie Chatfield (pictured) says she enjoyed a weekend together with Bachelorette runner-up Todd King 'but that's it'

The reality TV runner-ups first sparked romance rumours last month when they had a flirtatious exchange on Instagram.

When Todd defended the bubbly blonde against sexist trolls, she replied with: 'Send me a date card already, you feminist icon.'

According to New Idea, Abbie has been telling friends about their relationship but right now she wants to keep it low-key.

Top secret! According to New Idea, Abbie has been telling friends about her relationship with Todd (pictured) but for now she wants to keep it low-key

'I am dating someone, but I can't say who it is,' she told a pal.

Meanwhile, another source told Daily Mail Australia that Abbie and Todd attended a documentary screening last week in Brisbane, where they were 'acting like a couple'.

'They were definitely together,' said the onlooker.

So close! Abbie made it to the finale of The Bachelor, but was left heartbroken when Matt Agnew (left) chose Chelsie McLeod as his winner instead

'They were following each other around all night and [Todd] couldn't keep his hands off her.'

Abbie made it to the finale of The Bachelor, but was left heartbroken when astrophysicist Matt Agnew chose Chelsie McLeod instead.

Last year Todd faced a similar disappointment, when Bachelorette Ali Oetjen dumped him for bank manager Taite Radley.
description: They were sensationally pictured this week rolling around on a beach kissing.
authors: Shannon Shipley For Daily Mail Australia
